mapper.insert: INSERT INTO COUPON ( COUPON_NO, COUPON_TYPE, COUPON_NAME, BENEFIT, USE_PERIOD, ISSUER, ISSUE_DATE, USE_COUNT, STATUS, MANAGE, SAYOUNG, BARGUP ) VALUES ( COUPON_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{coupon_type}, #{coupon_name}, #{benefit}, #{use_period}, #{issuer}, #{issue_date}, #{use_count}, #{status}, #{manage}, #{sayoung}, #{bargup} )
mapper.select: SELECT COUPON_NO AS coupon_no, COUPON_TYPE AS coupon_type, COUPON_NAME AS coupon_name, BENEFIT AS benefit, USE_PERIOD AS use_period, ISSUER AS issuer, ISSUE_DATE AS issue_date, USE_COUNT AS use_count, STATUS AS status, MANAGE AS manage, SAYOUNG AS sayoung, BARGUP AS bargup FROM COUPON ORDER BY COUPON_NO DESC
